docs.title: Flywheels
docs.text:
Flywheels is an async-first Python web framework

PyPI package

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

docs.title: Chore
docs.text:
• Fix dependency installation in dependencies workflow
  • Scaffold Project (#1)

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: First off, thanks for wanting to contribute to Flywheels!
